title: Ebert & Roeper - 05.25.08 - guest host Michael Phillips
description:
Ebert & Roeper  -  May 25th, 2008 - with guest host [url=http://www.chicagotribune.com/features/chi-michaelphillipscritic,1,931773.storygallery?coll=chi-entertainment-utl]Michael Phillips[/url], film critic for the Chicago Tribune

---- New movies this week:
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0367882/]Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0896798/]Cleaner[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1000771/]Recount[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0884224/]War, Inc.[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0889588/]The Children of Huang Shi[/url]

	--- Next Week
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1000774/]Sex and the City[/url]
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0482606/]The Strangers[/url]
	--- Coming Soon
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0441773/]Kung Fu Panda[/url]

-------------------------------------------------
SPOILERS - The following list gives the thumbs up or thumbs down vote which the movies received.  (Phillips - Roeper)
-------------------------------------------------

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0367882/]Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull[/url]  -  (breaks my heart) down (skip it) - up (see it)
-- Harrison Ford - Karen Allen - Cate Blanchett - Shia LaBeouf - Ray Winstone - John Hurt

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0896798/]Cleaner[/url]  -  (way) down - (way) down
-- Samuel L. Jackson - Ed Harris - Eva Mendes

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1000771/]Recount[/url]  -  up - (one of the best movies of the year) up
-- on HBO
-- Kevin Spacey - Denis Leary - Tom Wilkinson - Laura Dern

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0884224/]War, Inc.[/url]  -  down - down
-- John Cusack - Marisa Tomei - Hilary Duff - Joan Cusack - Ben Kingsley

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0889588/]The Children of Huang Shi[/url]  -  down - down
-- Jonathan Rhys Meyers - Radha Mitchell - Yun-Fat Chow

	Cannes Film Festival Report
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0824747/]Changeling[/url] - (directed by Clint Eastwood)
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0497465/]Vicky Cristina Barcelona[/url] - (directed by Woody Allen)
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0441773/]Kung Fu Panda[/url]

	---Thumbs Up Video
		--Phillips:
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0772168/]Grace Is Gone[/url]  -  2007  -  [url=http://www.amazon.com/Grace-Gone-John-Cusack/dp/B0013D8LBS/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=dvd&qid=1211817296&sr=1-1](amazon)[/url]
		--Roeper:
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0795493/]Cassandra&#039;s Dream[/url]  -  2007  -  [url=http://www.amazon.com/Cassandras-Dream-Ewan-McGregor/dp/B0013D8LC2/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=dvd&qid=1211817214&sr=1-1](amazon)[/url]

	---Roeper&#039;s Three to See (favorite movies currently in theaters)
		3 - [url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0811080/]Speed Racer[/url]
		2 - [url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0367882/]Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull[/url]
		1 - [url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1000771/]Recount[/url]

-------------------------------------------------
Siskel & Ebert and Ebert & Roeper video reviews dating back to 1985 can be found at [url=http://www.atthemoviestv.com/]atthemoviestv.com[/url]
Free [url=http://www.apple.com/podcasting/]Podcasts[/url] of Ebert & Roeper are available at the [url=http://www.apple.com/itunes/]iTunes Music Store[/url]

[url=http://www.suntimes.com/index/roeper.html]Richard Roeper columns[/url]
-------------------------------------------------
